scripts.start: npm run set:development:env && npm run killall && docker-compose --env-file .env.development -f build/development/docker-compose.yml up -d && sam local start-api -p 4002
scripts.start:prod: npm run start:bastion && npm run set:production:env && npm run killall && docker-compose --env-file .env.development -f build/development/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.deploy:app:infrastructure: npm run deploy:ecr:infrastructure && npm run deploy && npm run deploy:sqs:infrastructure && build/production/scripts/deploy-app-infrastructure.sh
scripts.sequelize:dev:create: npm run set:development:env && NODE_ENV=development sequelize --env development db:create
scripts.sequelize:prod:create: npm run set:production:env && NODE_ENV=production sequelize --env production db:create
scripts.sequelize:dev:migrate: npm run set:development:env && NODE_ENV=development sequelize --env development db:migrate
scripts.sequelize:dev:migrate:undo: npm run set:development:env && NODE_ENV=development sequelize --env development db:migrate:undo
scripts.sequelize:prod:migrate: npm run set:production:env && NODE_ENV=production sequelize --env production db:migrate
scripts.sequelize:prod:migrate:undo: npm run set:production:env && NODE_ENV=production sequelize --env production db:migrate:undo
